A fencing barrier along the road signifies ongoing construction or restricted area access, providing a clear boundary and reducing the likelihood of unexpected crossings into the road from that side.

Lastly, there is a construction site visible on the right, complete with heavy machinery and materials. This indicates high activity and potential for random obstructions or people entering the road, which requires the ego vehicle to exercise additional caution when navigating the area.
